# SWAttributionView.BackgroundStyle.color

**Case**

A non-material background color for the view’s contents, best when placed over monochrome backgrounds.

## Declaration

```swift
case color
```

## Background styles

- **SWAttributionView.BackgroundStyle.default**: The default background style the system chooses.
- **SWAttributionView.BackgroundStyle.material**: A material background blur for the view’s contents, best when placed over multicolored backgrounds.
